duties_responsibilities.duty: Setting up and maintaining audio equipment, enhancing audio with appropriate sound effects, fixing sound-related issues
Operation and troubleshooting of AV/projection/lighting/conferencing equipment, devices, and systems
Ensuring AV equipment is fully operational, repairing or cleaning it when necessary
Taping down and organizing loose wire and cable, checking delivered equipment and completing projects to specifications

education_certification.credential: At least 2 years of experience in a hotel or convention center setting
